tool_description: Get latest news on climate update all over the United Kingdom
name: Live Climate Update
title: Live Climate Update

api_list.name: Get individual source news update
api_list.description: Get climate updates from specific news source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-climate-update.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-climate-update.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-climate-update.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-climate-update.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all climate updates
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about climate change from all over the U.K
